name: Load Shedding
description: Load Shedding - Bad Dudes have taken over the island and stolen all of the power, it is up to You to stop them!

name: Magic Lantern Festival
description: Magic Lantern Festival is a hyper multitask 2D bullet hell. Players are required to recreate their brain in order to dodge all the magic bullets and answer random quizzes simultaneously.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Asspen Pack
description: Get ready to hit the slopes with the Asspen Cosmetics Pack featuring iconic outfits from the season 6 episode, “Asspen.”

name: Eggconsole Shin Maou Golvellius MSX2
description: Upgraded to support MSX2+, "MAOU GOLVELLIUS" has been reborn with enhanced graphics. Join the quest to save Princess Rena of the Kingdom of Aleid!

name: Chocolate Factory Tycoon
description: Will you rise to the top as the ultimate Chocolate Tycoon?

name: Slide Puzzle
description: A new type of falling object puzzle in which you slide and erase blocks by aligning them.

name: You adorable! Elfin Clay 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Evidence Destroyer
description: Eliminate the Clues to Solve the Case!

name: Sled Riders
description: Discover incredible winter sled races on exciting tracks against other racers!

name: Crazy Stunt Driver: Extreme Racing Simulator
description: Extreme racing with stunts and jumps on dangerous tracks - set new records and take first place in the standings!

name: Anomaly Hotel
description: You start from the 10th floor in a hotel and must make your way to the exit. However, you must look for any potential anomalies on each floor to safely make it out.

name: Tennis Manager 2024
description: The courts have missed you, it’s time to sign your comeback and prove yourself as the greatest tennis manager. Tennis Manager 2024 is back and better than ever! Get ready to strategize, train your new wonderkids, and conquer the courts in the most immersive tennis management experience yet!

name: My Recycling Center: Container Truck Expansion
description: Start the container skip or dump truck! Load the filled containers with the animated crane and drive them to the waste processing plant. Get through the animated gate to the weigh station and see how much is loaded. Then unload the trash in the designated areas.

name: Casino Simulator
description: Casino Simulator Expand Your Casino From Scratch, Hire Employees, Customize It, Gamble, Enjoy Your Own Casino

name: Mad Island
description: This survival game is packed with features including crafting, exploring, building, excavation, farming, fishing, capturing creatures, torture, battle, and a story with many forks along the way. The objective is to escape the island, but is that really your only choice?

name: Fabled Lands: The Serpent King's Domain
description: Navigate through the dense, trap-filled jungles, ascend the unexplored Plateau of Dragons, unravel the haunts of Tarshesh, and challenge the immortal Serpent King. Beyond the treacherous seas, discover mysterious islands and seek fortune among the perilous ports of Ankon-Konu.

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince - Blood Pact Weapon Skins
description: Sometimes you need to fight fire with fire and blood with blood. Use the Order's own demonic weapons against them by equipping this weapon skin pack.

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince - Brotherhood of Light Cosmetic Pack
description: Fight darkness and the Order by proudly wearing the Brotherhood of Light cosmetic pack. It contains a unique helm for each of your classes, a new skin for your weapons, and the Sacred Emblems pack to customize your squad and banner.

name: Paper Dash: Invasion of Greed
description: Jump into "Paper Dash - Invasion of Greed," a relaxing escape into a world where your paper plane soars through levels shaped by human desires. Fly, glide, dash, scare away ghosts, and enjoy a peaceful journey, facing the ghosts of greed in abstract and beautiful environments.

name: Toon
description: Toon is a First Person Shooter game.

name: Magical Mic Duel: Senpai, Hear My Spell
description: Embrace your destiny in Magical Mic Duel: Senpai, Hear My Spell! Your voice commands the forces of fabulousness. Chant spells with conviction, and witness dazzling displays of magical might! The world needs your power. Step up and claim your place as the ultimate magical girl!

name: Pam's Fantastic Adventures
description: a compilation of lovely escape room puzzle games.

name: Oji-Mama
description: "Relying on someone else? That's just not possible." A young man, exhausted from working at a toxic company, decides to recuperate in the countryside. Supporting him is a kind and buff uncle. The uncle becomes a mama figure, healing the young man's body and soul with erotic healing powers!

name: Dave the Diver: Godzilla
description:
Dave the Diver: Godzilla is a free DLC update that adds the following content to the base game:

- New missions: Three new Godzilla DLC-exclusive missions have been added.
- New dishes
Discover new dishes inspired by Godzilla and Ebirah
- New Godzilla figures scattered through the ocean

name: Zet Zillions
description: Zet Zillions is a single-player roguelike deckbuilder where you use your cards to make freakish combinations and explode entire planets. BIG-BADDA-BOOM!

name: Duck Detective: The Secret Salami
description: Solving crime is no walk in the pond. You are a down-on-his-luck detective who also happens to be a duck. Use your powers of de-duck-tion to inspect evidence, fill in the blanks, and bust the case wide open, in a narrative mystery adventure where nothing is quite as it seems.

name: Extreme Rally Raid
description: Extreme Rally Raid is a 3D PC game, close to rally raid races experiences. Extreme races, long and strong stages, in natural environments with a lower human intervention.

name: Kubikon 3D
description: Cubes, cubes, cubes... Cubes everywhere. Whether you're in the mood to challenge your brain or just relax, Kubikon and its addictive gameplay are here for you!

name: CoinBlock Clicker
description: CoinBlock Clicker is an idle clicker with a unique way of merging idle and clicker fun into one game! You simply click thousands of times on the coinblock and make those coins fly all over your screen!

name: C.A.R.D.S. RPG: The Misty Battlefield
description: This game combines roguelike-style deckbuilding with SRPGs to create an all-new experience! Follow Vel as she leads the Clausewitz Battalion into battle against Fahftania and the Hellmuth Brigade. Collect 50 different cards to build the strongest deck and fight enemies on a map shrouded in mist.

name: Kid Pilot
description: Embark on an immersive VR adventure in Kid Pilot. Soar through whimsical skies, pilot various aircraft, and conquer thrilling challenges. Ignite your imagination and experience the joy of flight in this captivating aviation journey. Get ready to take off!

name: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2
description: Earth Defense Force: World Brothers 2 tells the story of what happened to the voxel Earth after the events of the first installment. It cleverly introduces elements from Earth Defense Force 6 and features the Wing Diver Shooter, who didn’t make it into the previous game. This latest installment is filled with more love for the Earth Defense Force series (and Earth!) than ever before!

name: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
description:
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a full 3D remake of the first game in the legendary Wizardry series of RPGs. It is built directly on top of the original 1981 game's code. Although it looks all new, underneath the hood is the authentic game. You can even view the original Apple II interface as you play.

While the well-known difficulty of the enemies has not been altered, quality-of-life improvements have been added in every area. Party management, navigation, spellcasting, and combat have all been significantly enhanced.

name: Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
description:
A remake of the second game in the Paper Mario series, originally released for the Nintendo GameCube.

Turn the page and join Mario and friends in an RPG adventure to discover the legendary treasure behind the ancient Thousand-Year Door. Will Mario complete his papery quest, or will he crumple under the pressure?

name: Redneck Joe vs The Swamp Zombies
description: In this exciting third-person shooter, play as brave Joe, a typical Redneck who must fight against hordes of zombies and scary monsters.

name: Venture's Gauntlet VR
description: Venture's Gauntlet VR is a thrilling, immersive adventure game set in breathtaking landscapes. Test your stamina, accuracy, wit and reflexes as you navigate treacherous terrain, solve puzzles, and navigate obstacles. So get ready to embark on the adventure of a lifetime!

name: Ships at Sea
description: Experience the thrill of navigating a wide range of ships. Immerse yourself in various career paths such as service, cargo and commercial fishing, as you explore the breathtaking open world of Norway´s Lofoten Islands with its stunning scenery. The ocean is within your reach!

name: Galacticare
description: Save the galaxy - one patient at a time! As the new director of Galacticare, you will build and manage a series of hospitals to keep your patients alive for as long as possible - for money! And also because it’s the right thing to do.

name: Taora: Survival
description: Taora is an open world survival game with unique character building and crafting. Build and upgrade your base, and survive the zombie apocalypse !

name: Witch & Lilies
description: Witch & Lilies is a Girls Love RPG where players must pair up girls for both combat and romance as they venture through dungeons. Developed with scenario writer Kedoin Makoto (Corpse Party) and character designer magodesu (Space Patrol Luluco).

name: Hauntii
description: A beguiling adventure in which you uncover the secrets of an expansive and mysterious world - haunting both the environment and its denizens to craft ingenious solutions to the many challenges that await.

name: Serum
description: Immerse yourself in a survival experience, where a mysterious liquid takes hold of your life. Courage, time pressure and the sheer will to survive will determine your future.

name: Blade Jumper
description: In 2045, a super-large building was built in the middle of Yeouido, Seoul. The name of the building is Kukuru Tower. You have to enter Kukuru Tower, whose height is unknown, to overthrow the dictatorship that dominates the city. Even if you fall, jump again and go up!

name: Dark Notes
description: Dark Notes is a dark suspense plot puzzle game. You will play the two protagonists, traveling through time and space, to explore the secrets hidden in the happiness mall!

name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince
description:
As the Hundred Year War rages on, assume the head of a noble family and seek out glory in this tactical turn-based strategy game. Fend off enemy factions and battle an evil force that has corrupted the highest echelons of society, exploiting the conflict for its own gain through a violent and mysterious cult.

From your castle, recruit, equip and train soldiers to fight your enemies and protect the population. As you face the challenges thrown at you, your skills in management and diplomacy will be put to the test. With the world on the brink of collapse, there is only one solution: Evil must be defeated.

name: Soul Link
description: Soul Link is a challenging puzzle game where you use your intelligence to build bridges with falling pieces of various shapes. Reconnect this broken land with Soul Bridges, and make the world whole again!

name: Pine Hearts
description: Pine Hearts is a cosy little narrative-adventure game set in the sleepy scenery of Pine Hearts Caravan Park. Explore the great outdoors as you uncover items, unlock new paths, and discover all the little secrets stuffed throughout the Park.

name: Code.Breaker()
description: Code.Breaker() is a cyberpunk visual novel about technology, cybercrime, and trying to survive in a world ruled by corporations. Hack your way out of your worst day at a job you´re not supposed to have.

name: Never Ending Dungeon
description: Never Ending Dungeon is AI-powered software to adventures creation for Tabletop RPGs. Less prep, more play. A huge time saver for DMs and Players!

name: Warno
description: Realistic, immersive, breathtaking. Warno is the ultimate World War III battle simulator. A Cold War turns decisively hot as you command hundreds of units on a beautiful and brutal battlefield. Outsmart, outfight, and lead your forces to total victory.

name: Kong's Wrath: City of Mayhem
description: Become the banana-hungry kaiju, Kong. Climb, fight, and leap your way through a highly militarized concrete jungle. Collect bananas, and compete for the highest banana count on a world-wide leaderboard. This is a roguelike, arcade style game with no ending, only further mayhem.

name: Rocket Rumble
description: Rocket Rumble is the racing party game! Combining the best parts of combat racing and fast-paced action fighting games, Rocket Rumble is a 1-4 player party game where a charming cast of animals in rocket suits smash and bash their way across the finish line. Rocket Rumble features single-screen, online multiplayer, and action-packed combat across 9 different obstacle courses.

name: Terra Randoma
description: Terra Randoma is a turn-based tactical roguelike RPG with a fluid combat system. You live the life of an adventurer in a procedurally generated open world full of curiosities. Your actions affect the world and your story emerges as you play.

name: Wanwan Datte Uchuu No Shinpi
description: The great adventures of Space Investigator Pon-kun. While on his mission to search for Area51 on Earth, he comes across a stray dog named Pucchi and turns her into a human girl. Unable to reverse his mistake, he takes her along on his journey.

name: Lost in Tropics
description: Lost in Tropics: Embark on an unforgettable survival adventure where the lush, unpredictable tropics become your testing ground. In this immersive game, you find yourself stranded on a mysterious island, where every corner hides both breathtaking beauty and perilous challenges.

name: Chivalry 2: Regicide Update
description:
Chivalry 2’s Regicide Update introduces the Team Objective Map – Regicide at Trayan Citadel, the new Goedendag weapon, a new Campaign, quality of life improvements, and more.
Update Highlights
New Team Objective map – “Regicide at Trayan Citadel”
New Campaign Pass – “Regicide”
New Character Bundle – “Agatha Rebel Knight”
New Weapon – “Goedendag”
Combat Changes
QoL Improvements

name: Trainz 2019: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
description: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Trainz Plus: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
description: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Dragon Buurrp!
description:
From the olden days, the Great Dragons needed three things.
Treasures, princesses and, above all else… a super awesome tower!
Led by instinct, our newborn baby dragon set out to find a perfect tower for himself.
But the vile monsters of the tower dungeon were anticipating the dragon’s arrival…
Join our cuddly baby dragon for an adventure to conquer the tower!

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.4
description: Sin descripción

name: Ground to Dust
description: Navigate your way through a hostile underground facility in this two-dimensional side-scroller inspired by games like Hollow Knight and Metroid. Fight everything from a cleaning robot to a businessman trying to sell you goods while actively killing you. There are over 20 levels to explore in this non-linear platformer.

name: Hentai Mania
description: A set of 4 very beautiful hentai puzzles.

name: Sushi Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: BR Diesel Brake Tenders
description: This pack contains 3 types of British Railways (BR) brake tenders, 2 prototypes and 1 main production variant, which includes 3 different types of bogies, with 3 different period liveries in clean and weathered versions.

name: Battle Teams 2: Iconic Bundle
description: Unlock the Iconic Bundle!

name: Myth Matrix
description: A Turn-based strategic card battle game. Collect cards, develop your unique deck and strategy, and have a fun PvP match with players all over the world!

name: Catlists: Bright Accent Colors Pack
description: Unlock 10+ additional bright accent colors

name: Catlists: Dark Accent Colors Pack
description: Unlock 10+ additional dark accent colors

name: DCS World: F/A-18C Operation Green Line by BADGER633
description: This campaign is based on fictitious events and follows on from ‘Ford' and ‘Matrix's' exploits in the Straits of Hormuz on board the USS Abraham Lincoln in the “Rise of the Persian Lion II” Campaign.

name: Block Pieces
description: Block Pieces is a 3D jigsaw puzzle, minimalist and relaxing experience. Exercise your skill in reassembling 3D models back to their original form, while listening to a relaxing soundtrack.

name: Dashlab
description: A 2D time attack game where you dash around rooms and collect buffs and debuffs to complete levels as fast as possible. Featuring an endless mode where you can use your own songs!

name: My Hobby: Needlework Galore
description: Everything you need to create beautiful needlework creations! Simply select a spool of colored thread, find the corresponding number, and watch your fantastic needlework come to life in glorious textured detail with no wasted time gathering supplies and threading needles!

name: Mr. Hopp's Playhouse HD
description: Step back into the unsettling world of Mr. Hopp's Playhouse where every child's nightmare becomes a chilling reality.

name: Tiny Machinery: Lost Reality
description: You've been kidnapped by unknown scientists and your brain has been plugged into a sophisticated machine to run an experiment: travel into a virtual dimension to unlock weird machinery.

name: Real Kart
description: Unique game! Which has no analogues in this genre. 1. Learning mode for creating your own go-kart. 2. Race with your ghosts for first place in the world ranking table. 3. Race with a friend on two gamepads or just on one keyboard with split screen.

name: Dungeon Riddle
description: In this game, you find yourself in a dungeon where you need to look for keys and potions to move on. But there is one problem here - traps. They can be anywhere, and if you step on one of them, you'll have to start over.

name: The Fear of The Past
description: The Fear of the Past is First person psychological horror game. You find your self in abandoned places and you have no idea how did you end there. Stalkers try to catch and you have to fixed the puzzle to escape the nightmares.

name: Idle Champions: Classic Mimic Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Classic Mimic Familiar Sketch Skin for Mimic Familiar 4 Epic Potions of Speed 4 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 4 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 1 Potion of Polish

name: Realm of Gems
description: The main character finds themselves ensnared within a mysterious realm, and it's up to you to help them avoid getting lost in time. As our hero navigates different time periods, they must find gems to control the flow of time.

name: Hidden Vintage House Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden FPS Shooting Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Hidden Haunted Town Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Sushi Race
description: The sushi you know and love... as racecars?! Operate your sushi vehicle and tear through course after course!

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Additional Character: Beatrix
description: Set Contents: • Playable character: Beatrix • Premium Avatar: Beatrix • Badge: Beatrix • Weapon Cutout: Embrasque Sword • Figure Studio poses 1-6 and expressions 1-7 for Beatrix

name: Liminal Doom 2
description: Liminal Doom 2: Crossing The Threshold is a set of seven MBF21 maps that are themed around the liminal space aesthetic. With a more elaborated and ambitious scope compared to its prequel, these maps hopefully will offer a different and unique experience. Each map has a different kind of atmosphere and purpose, and high attention was put into balancing the high energy gameplay moments with the quiet ones. Combat varies a lot in terms of encounters and enemy placement, and progression its mostly non linear with an emphasis on exploration and resource starvation if you are playing on UV.

name: Xenosphere
description: Drift, spin, dash, and golf your way in a journey through interstellar glyph space.

name: Friendship Island
description: Escape from friendship island plagued by aliens. Classic FPS

name: Holy Clash Cards
description: With stunning visuals, immersive soundscapes, and intuitive gameplay, Holy Clash Cards offers an unparalleled gaming experience that will captivate both newcomers and seasoned veterans alike. Will you rise to glory, or will your faith falter in the face of adversity? The fate of your army awaits.

name: Faint Call
description: Faint Call is a psychological horror game about a police officer investigating a distress call from someone at a notoriously cursed house.

name: Phantom Watcher
description: Phantom Watcher is a chilling horror-strategy game. Survive the haunted hospital's mysteries, navigating ghostly behaviors in a unique CRT aesthetic. Each playthrough is a new eerie challenge. Dare to uncover the secrets?

name: Belladonna
description: Darkness twists the minds of those who reside in the Ricci Estate. Once a paragon of class and wealth, the land now lies desecrated with darkness-imbued vampiric terrors. Belladonna, mother of the Ricci family, now returns to her old home to face the threat and put an end to the madness.

name: Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls
description: Embark on a post-apocalyptic odyssey in Hentai Senpai: Apocalypse Girls. Solve puzzles, unlock 56 captivating survivors, and immerse yourself in 5K visuals. Customize your experience, all to the electric fusion of country and jazz tunes amidst the ruins.

name: Hentai Sensei
description: Hentai Sensei is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: Guess the Door
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Puzzle: Old Sea Port
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Toad's Soul Hopper
description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Toad's Soul Hopper" is hopping action game where you aim for the top from bottom to top! Will he soar into action with weapons in hand to stop Anemone's mischief and save his friends?

name: Pirarucu's Money Rush
description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! "Pirarucu's Money Rush" is a side-scrolling shopping rampage game! At each stage checkpoint, which changes with every play, you can purchase items to gain an advantage in the game.

name: Octo's Balloon Challenge
description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! Master the art of flying balloons and balancing on a seesaw to collect lots of Souls! Challenge yourself in this new sensation game where 'buoyancy' is the key!

name: Snail's Knock Out!
description: From the asymmetrical party action game 'Goonya Monster' designed by Terada Tera , a spin-off work has emerged! Enemy in sight? Throw bombs! Blast away! "Snail's Knock Out" is a casual shooting game. Blast away the undead appearing in stages with increasing speed and relieve accumulated stress!

name: Psoltrix
description: Play Tetris on a regular dodecahedron or icosahedron. The latest development in falling-block technology.

name: Necromantic
description: Start out as a lowly freshman at Valorborn Academy and prove yourself to the school and other students – or don’t, and repeatedly fall to the legions of horrors that await in Necromantic. Study up to survive in this dark and dangerous fantasy Bullet Heaven ... solo or by online co-op.

name: RKGK
description: Turn heads. Drop jaws. Be bright. In this single-player 3D platformer, you’re the only one who can take down Mr. Buff and his lackies to restore color and life to the citizens of Cap City. Accompany Valah and the RKGK crew on their journey to take down the oppressive B Corp.

name: Finding Sparky
description: 'Finding Sparky' is game in which an extremely ordinary boy, Tom, goes on an adventure across a haunted village to retrieve his kidnapped dog. With Tom, defeat the ghosts and (a slightly big) animal friends to get to the bottom of the case and find out what the hell dog kidnapper really wan

name: Catlists
description: The word-based, multiplayer, party game that doesn't require internet!

name: RollScape
description: Roll, strategize, and upgrade your way to victory in this accessible and ultra-satisfying, yet captivating roguelike. Will you reach the end before running out of rolls? KEEP MULTIPLYING!!

name: D-Day Invasions
description: 64 player PVP matches in VR

name: Hitman 3: The Undying Pack
description: Unlock a series of cosmetics inspired by The Undying Elusive Target mission and gain permanent access to The Oroborous - A three-level Arcade contract featuring The Undying Elusive Target.

name: Battle For The Crystals
description: Prepare for a relentless battle in "Battle for the Crystals," a homage to the classic full-scale retro warfare games that demand skill and strategic prowess. Take control of a mighty hero and strategically command your troops in minimalistic yet challenging battlefields.

name: Five Hundred
description: The classic Five Hundred card game, available on PC! This version of the game has been lovingly crafted over many years to be the best possible version of the game it can be, now available on Steam!

name: Fixer's Tale
description: Welcome to the Scientific Research Facility "Camelot-22". The emergency personnel replacement system has chosen you to address the next unusual contingency. Immerse yourself in the humorous tale of a repair job filled with laughter, silly dialogues, angry chairs, and dim-witted robots.

name: Captain Stu
description: Captain Stu is a 2.5d platformer set in the bright and beautiful Caribbean. Defeat enemies with sword or pistol and navigate through the dangerous world.

name: Ebbil: Alternative Bible
description: In Heaven, mistakes have been made. In this story inspired by webseries 'The Mandela Catalogue', follow Archangel Gabriel through a trial of corruption and feigned purity as he explores celestial realms and the rekindling of lost friendships. Will you save the Heavens, or will you see them fall?

name: DCS World: F-4E Phantom II by Heatblur Simulations
description: The F-4 Phantom II is an American two-seat, twin-engine, all-weather, long- range supersonic jet interceptor and fighter-bomber originally developed by McDonnell Aircraft for the United States Navy.

name: Sunland Town
description: Welcome to Sunland Town  a serene and mystical walking simulator. Explore a captivating world as you search for hidden items, unlock secrets, and immerse yourself in the beauty of this unique town!

name: Ouros
description: Ouros is a calming puzzle game about forming beautiful curves in a serene environment.

name: An English Haunting
description: While looking for the existence of the Great Beyond, Professor Patrick Moore, aided by a fake medium, will build a device to see the other side, embark on a search for a millenary artefact, and investigate the most haunted manor of 1907 England.

name: Please Be Kind to the Chickens
description: A sokoban-style puzzle game. Bend the chickens to your will by manipulating the environment and/or setting them on fire. Explore beautiful open spaces while wrestling with logic-defying puzzles.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Akuma
description:
Akuma is the fourth DLC character for Street Fighter 6 and final character in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A demon of combat that has welcomed the Satsui no Hado into his being in his quest to become the ultimate master of the fist.

name: Venture to the Vile
description: Your life is plunged into disarray by a monstrous entity known as “the Vile”. With the town in shambles and your arm left blackened by the Vile, you discover that your best friend, Luella, is also missing. Will you save the town and find Luella — or will you give in to the monster you've become?

name: Harvest Hunt
description: Trapped in a cursed village, you’re pitted against a vicious monster. To survive, an appointed Warden must harvest the cornfields and face the monster using stealth, strategy and handcrafted tools. Face new challenges every night while being relentlessly hunted. Can you save your community?

name: Sunrise's Order
description: Having your own farm as your favorite game hero is your biggest dream. You decide to become the proud owner of a desert island and you are ready to embark on this new adventure and sell your farm products to your future customers.

name: Shadows of Taumiel
description: First-person horror game that includes several genres such as stealth, platforming and exploration.

name: Wuthering Waves
description:
Wuthering Waves is a story-rich open-world action RPG. You wake from your slumber as Rover, joined by a vibrant cast of Resonators on a journey to reclaim your lost memories and surmount the Lament.

The game features fast-paced combat with a variety of mechanics such as Extreme Evasion and Dodge Counter. You can also absorb the remaining of the monsters you've defeated and use their power in battles.

name: The Journey of AutUmn
description: The Journey of AutUmn - A classic point-and-click adventure game with completely hand-painted graphics. The player controls an android that crashes during its mission through a variety of lovingly designed environments and solves classic inventory puzzles.

name: Isles of Sea and Sky
description: A fantastical, oceanic, and open world puzzle adventure game. Solve novel block-pushing puzzles while unearthing a mystifying narrative, awakening delightful new friends, gathering collectables, and unleashing extraordinary powers beyond your wildest imagination.

name: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers!
description: Yay! Spring Trip with My Coworkers! is a Visual Novel created for Blossom VN Jam 2024 and Fuck Capitalism Jam 2024 as it's about a trip full of fun spring activities and complaining about your job.

name: Summit
description:
Summit is an exhilarating mountain climbing game that requires precision platforming. Players embark on an epic journey to conquer the mountain by overcoming puzzle platforming obstacles and mastering climbing techniques.

With over 70 puzzle rooms to navigate, Summit offers precision platforming at its best. Equipped with 2 pickaxes, scale the mountain to reach the top. Avoid physics based environmental hazards as you uncover the story behind our protagonist’s unwavering tenacity to reach the top.

Will you reach the summit?

name: 2Xtreme
description: Experience 2Xtreme originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

name: The Heist of the Argonaut Limited
description: Play the part of a witless criminal, hired for a daring train heist where everything goes wrong. Made in the style of classic RPGs and text adventure games; read, roll, and choose your way through this thrilling adventure with countless paths and dozens of unique endings.

name: Dooblets
description: This adventure supports 2 - 4 players! Play through 4 unique worlds filled with challenges and puzzles with your friends!

name: Conjured Through Death
description: Step into the captivating world of Conjured Through Death, where the boundaries between heroism and villainy blur, and redemption beckons amidst the shadows.

name: Teletext Chaser
description: Sin descripción

name: Rail Route: Happy Passengers
description: This expansion focuses on the art of keeping passengers happy in your rail network. Introducing a completely new angle of gameplay, adding passenger demands in your cycles.

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Track Pass 2024
description: Get all upcoming 2024 Track expansions for MX vs ATV Legends at a special price!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - 2024 AMA Pro Motocross Championship
description: Compete like the pros on 12 official tracks from the 2024 AMA Pro Motocross Championship, including the legendary Loretta Lynn's!

name: Freestyle2: Must-have summer Outfit Box
description: Hit the court this summer with the coolest looks and make every game a fashion statement!

name: Freestyle2: Hot Summer Outfit Box
description: 1 trendy summer outfits & 5 must-have accessories Perfect for a hot summer day at the beach

name: RISK: Global Domination - Viking Legends Map Pack
description: Step into the realms of Norse mythology with these maps inspired by great Viking myths and legends.

name: The Method of Hiding a Body
description: A story-driven horror puzzle game where the player takes on the role of a resentful ghost, possessing others in order to search for her own corpse.

name: Polish Community Project
description: A bunch of Polish guys made a bunch of maps and put them together to celebrate Doom,

name: Silencio
description:
Everything you see is hand-modeled in clay and animated frame by frame using the stop motion technique.

It is an experience of less than a minute that took several days to complete.

Achieve silence.🫀

name: Skizz
description: In Skizz, ski down the mountain, explore legends, and enhance your skills. There are no set objectives, just fun and discoveries. Descend, level up, and unravel mysteries at every turn.

name: Cats
description: Cats — and that says it all. Interactive cat clicker. Click on cats for new cats. That's all, really.

name: Moonstone Island: Arcane Artifacts
description: This DLC is entirely centered around that mysterious weirdo that you love to love, with new dialogue, new events, and lots of Magic Man-themed furniture to make a shrine out of. We see you.

name: Need for Speed: Unbound - Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass
description: The Vol. 7 Premium Speed Pass immediately grants the new Ford Mustang Dark Horse ‘24 and opens up access to its bodykits plus 3 Custom versions of the new Vol. 7 cars. You'll also gain access to sick, new customizations — over 30 content tiers.

name: Mirrorscape: Deluxe Starter Pack
description: Jump right into the action with the Deluxe Game Master's Edition! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Mirrorscape: Outdoor Starter Pack
description: Jump right into the action with the Outdoor Starter Pack! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Tale of the Singing Peaks
description: This game is a 2D Pixel Art Narrative Puzzle Platformer created by Quantum Lemon Interactive in cooperation with the talented artists at Xueshu Game Studios. Game Features: 2D Platforming; Single Player Co-op Gameplay; Puzzle-Solving; NPC Interactions;

name: Stairway
description: Get out of the building via the stairway. Observe the levels carefully for a successful exit.

name: Gracia
description: Gracia is the world's first platform for viewing and publishing free-viewpoint ultra-photorealistic VR experiences. It's not just about seeing; it's about stepping inside a photo with freedom to walk around, where every detail is so vivid, you'll forget it's virtual.

name: Falco Tunes
description: Falco Tunes is a fun arcade game where you have to collect notes and attack harsh animals with them!

name: Cazzarion: Zombie Drive
description: Sin descripción

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition includes the full game, 9 DLCs with over 60 additional tracks plus the 2024 Vehicle Pass with over 30 original manufacturer vehicles!

Get this ultimate bundle for a special price!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition includes the full game, the 2024 Track Pass with 18 additional tracks and the 2024 Vehicle Pass which adds over 30 original vehicles to the already huge base game!
Get into MX vs ATV Legends with this special discounted bundle!

name: G-Police
description:
A 2024 port of G-Police, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

G-Police is a 1997 combat flight simulator set in a hypothetical future where corporations lead space colonies. The player is Jeff Slater, a futuristic helicopter pilot who joins the G-Police to investigate his sister's death.

name: Gender Neutral Chess
description: A chess variant where you can transform pieces on the fly to add excitement to the classic game.

name: A Few Days With: Cassandra
description: Join Cassandra, a captivating young woman, as you spend intimate moments together while embarking on a sensual butterfly-hunting escapade. In this hidden object game, awaken your senses as you explore each location to discover what lies beneath Cassandra's enticing layers.

name: Adora and My Treasure
description: The story of a girl named Adora, she travelled the land in search of legendary of treasure. The bows is a great weapon to defeat enemies along the way. Ready to go on an adventure?

name: Final Frog
description: Final Frog is a platform game in which a cute frog traverses levels to collect treasures (and flies)!

name: One More Gate: A Wakfu Legend - Complete Edition
description: Are you ready to go through the gate?

name: Elemental Novice
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in a world of elemental magic. Play as a young wizard mastering the elements to survive against dark forces. Explore haunting landscapes, hone your spells, and unravel mysteries while battling supernatural foes in this captivating adventure

name: Publish or Perish
description: Publish or Perish is a game that simulates working in academia. In order to keep your job, you must publish scientific work. Reviewers are here to get you and all you can do is try to survive. Can you publish enough papers to enjoy tenure? (Contains practical advice for academics)

name: Playing Kafka
description: There are things that often fail on nothing but themselves. Is there even a way out? Playing Kafka is a narrative adventure full of impenetrable schemes, insidious plot twists and conversations that slip out of hand. Based on Kafka’s life and his work, developed with Kafka experts.

name: Magic Research 2
description: Welcome to Magic Research 2, an incremental RPG from the creator of Magic Research. Learn countless spells, face powerful foes, and command a team of Wizards who can cast spells for you as you journey to find or create the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Harsh.
description: Harsh. is a fast, challenging action roguelite filled with emergent combinations, agressive music, engaging bossfights and diverse enemies. Your dash is the only way to switch guns and recharge your ammo. Choose buffs to create strong combinations and try to reach the core.

name: My Little Cemetery
description: Become the groundskeeper of a neglected graveyard. Find friends amongst the deceased, learn their stories, and give them a peaceful afterlife. Experience the juxtaposition of death in a cute and cozy atmosphere.

name: Your Earth
description: This game is an earth creation simulation game that allows you to create and view the earth in various shapes.

name: Trap Trek: Ultimate Other Me
description: 『Trap Trek: Ultimate Other Me』is a third-person shooter action game. Players must navigate through challenging stages filled with unique traps, embarking on thrilling adventures. In addition to dashing and jumping, players can create avatars to overcome the traps.

name: Charm Commerce
description: Run a business with adorable monster girls using power of desire! Employ girls, build your workplace and grow your business in the magical world. Unleash the charm of your team and watch your business thrive!

name: Potion Problem
description: Potion Problem is a whimsical potion making puzzler about discovery, problem solving and potions! Create potions and fulfill orders, prepare bizarre ingredients and learn the deepest secrets of the alchemists world.

name: Re≒Connect Exit Loop
description: The story of a dirty old otaku who was robbed of his beloved cat and a very rare beautiful girl figure, and travels through all dimensions and universes to recover what was stolen from him. He also saves the world.

name: Rooftops & Alleys: The Parkour Game
description: Ever felt like the world was missing that one Parkour/Freerunning game? That game that scratches that itch that other games just don't? Rooftops & Alleys aka TheParkourGame is here to deliver! In this game, there's is no 'hold button to parkour' mentality. Here, you, the player is in control!

name: Run x Gun
description: Run and gun while you shoot down hoards of alien space ships in a bullet hell shooter/endless runner. Upgrade you gun with various power ups and weapon types like rockets, grenades and lasers. And finally defeat menacing boss ships to save the world from the scourge of alien invaders.

name: Mirrorscape
description: Mirrorscape is bringing the table back to virtual tabletops! Play around the table or around the world using authentic 3D terrain, miniatures, and environmental effects from top companies you know and love. Cross-play on iOS and Android devices using the magic of augmented reality!

name: Tiny Breakers Camp
description: It is time for true heroes to stop an evil invasion that is spreading across our land. Face enemies from the deepest caves and dungeons in an engaging brick-breaker style of fight. Bring peace and justice to your homeland yet again.

name: Rebels: Under the Spell of Magic - Chapter 4
description: A Visual Novel game about adventure, fantasy, magic and friendship. This is a continuation of Chapter 3. There are only a few choices that can be made, and some paths to choose from. The decisions do not have an impact on the ending, instead they provide slightly different content.

name: Sumo Tanks
description: Sumo Tanks is a tank arena fighter where players shoot and ram each other to be the last standing in the ring. Select your tank and claim the title of grand Sumo Tanks champion.

name: Consortium Remastered
description: Become Consortium Bishop Six, a global peacekeeper in the year 2042. Speak and form friendships or enemies with a full cast of characters using your own voice. Take an active role in a murder mystery, on a plane, in the future. Every choice counts.

name: Consortium VR
description: Become Consortium Bishop Six, a global peacekeeper in the year 2042. Introducing V.O.I.C.E.: speak and form relationships with the entire crew of Zenlil using your own voice. Experience VR Interactive Cinema - take an active role in a murder mystery, on a plane, in the future. Every choice counts.

name: Rasant
description: With your ship, face several exciting space battles, full of shots and powerful enemies. Customize your spaceship by making it more and more powerful and get ready for a space trip that will make your adrenaline skyrocket!

name: StarHeroes
description:
StarHeroes is a top-quality third-person space shooter (TPS) which combines the best features of games like Everspace, Fortnite or Counter-Strike.

All this is to provide the player with dynamic multiplayer spaceship combat. In the game, you take on the role of a spaceship pilot - Star Hero - who, along with his team, competes against other players in one of two modes: Adventure Mode or Ranked Mode.

Both modes are skill-based and free to play, as we believe sustainable economy needs to be based on the fun arising from playing a game rather than playing to earn.

name: Synergy
description: Humans live on a hostile planet. In this survival city-building game, develop your city, face natural disasters, make the right choices. Explore this environment-changing world while keeping your people happy despite extreme weather conditions.

name: Survival: Fountain of Youth
description: Survival: Fountain of Youth is a challenging single-player survival game set up on a vast Caribbean archipelago. You play as a stranded 16th century sailor having to craft his way through the struggles of survival in order to unveil the mysteries of an ancient civilization and your own fate.

name: Tap Wizard 2
description: Choose your Spells, Perks, and Traits, then let the Wizard do all of the work in this unique Idle RPG! Tap Wizard 2 is a fusion of the Idle, Incremental, ARPG, and Twin-Stick Shooter genres, resulting in a game like no other!

name: XDefiant
description: Ubisoft's worlds collide in a free-to-play, first-person arena shooter where you compete to be the best in fast-paced online matches!

name: Cyberpulse
description: Slam your way through waves of viruses and hurl your friends through cyberspace in this flashy arcade thrower that combines classic twin-stick action with inventive physics for an electrifying adventure.

name: Mech Engineer
description: In this game you will try on the role of the chief mech engineer. You can design mechs, assembly and launch reactors, regulate weapons and, of course, send mechs into battle.

name: Senua's Saga: Hellblade II
description: The sequel to the award winning Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice, Senua returns in a brutal journey of survival through the myth and torment of Viking Iceland. Intent on saving those who have fallen victim to the horrors of tyranny, Senua faces a battle of overcoming the darkness within and without.

name: Apico 4.0: Hive of Industry
description: A new free update now available for the bee-loved beekeeping sim APICO on PC and Nintendo Switch! Update 4.0: A Hive of industry, introduces new automation machines, new pets, a new craftable resource, new seasonal events, and much more!

name: Memocratie
description: You are the leader of the Memocratic Party. Crowds of people have gathered under your office to protest. Give them money or drive them out, the choice is yours. Each choice will determine how long you stay in power.

name: Astroneer: Evolution Bundle
description: The Evolution Pack includes the exclusive Evolution Suit as well as a bundle of QBITS that you can use to make sure your Astroneer has a unique look as soon as you land on Sylva.

name: Microvolts: Recharged - Starter Pack: Silver 2
description: MICROVOLTS: Recharged - Starter Pack : Silver 21. MEMBERSHIP (15 days)2. 1,000 RT Coin3. Giant pink bunny hairband

name: Astro Miner: Caves
description: Explore 12 caves and collect all the treasures using your new vehicles!

name: Shape Survivor
description: Damn it, quickly kill the enemies surrounding you. Choose your weapon, freely combine weapon enhancements, and obtain advanced effects when fully reinforced.

name: UpUpUp
description: UPUPUP is a jumping action game. Go up to the sky with the lonely protagonist. Navigate through multiple obstacles, try not to fall, and reach your destination. To reward your efforts, your jumping power will increase as you jump. It is not saved. Fail, adapt, and try again.

name: Shoot or Die
description: 'Shoot or Die' is a thrilling 2D shooting game where you take on the role of the last human survivor facing a robotic uprising. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, such as the Fireball and Shield, and utilize game-changing perks, to navigate dynamic battlefields and outwit cunning enemy droids.

name: Risk of Rain 2: Devotion Update
description: Packed with an array of exciting content, this free update addresses various item and map bugs across both the base game and the Survivors of the Void expansion. It also includes a super awesome collaboration…..

name: Minecraft: 15 Year Journey
description: It’s time for a (literal) trip down memory lane! A lot has happened in these 15 years, so we’ve packed some of our most nostalgic moments, marvelous dimensions, and accidental proudest inventions from our past into a free map by Oreville Studios. The doors to the Minecraft Museum are open and admission is free, so what are you waiting for? Let’s head inside!

name: Infantry Attack: Strike from Above
description: Equip yourself with a new secondary weapon and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Infantry Attack: Drone Squad
description: Equip yourself with new drones and show your opponents who's the real boss!

name: Candy Puzzle
description: FPS puzzle game where player need solve puzzles and collect cakes

name: Aquarium Land: Puppy
description: Adopt a cute puppy and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Parrot
description: Adopt a lovely parrot and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Baby Seal
description: Adopt a baby seal and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Aquarium Land: Armadillo
description: Adopt a little armadillo and explore the aquatic world together!

name: Angel Legion: Secret Gift - Green
description: Embark on your adventure with player from all over the world! Lead your Angel team to reveal the ancient mysteries of Galaxy…… Welcome to Angel legion, a free RPG gacha game with good fun!

name: The Magic and Murder Bundle
description: Investigate the case of the missing magician, or summon a demonic harem of murderous mistresses in Neon Doctrine’s Magic and Murder Bundle!

name: Hentai Golf: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Wildlife Adventures Collection: 3 in 1
description: This bundle contains: - Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - Dolphin Spirit - Ocean Mission - Marsupilami Hoobadventure

name: Knight Runner: Blade and Bolt
description: Fight your way through an endless forest, slaying monsters, dodging traps, and chasing the highest score possible in this simple yet addictive pixel art runner.

name: Buzz is a VTuber: I want to be famous, even if it's just a game
description: Attention: Currently only available in JapaneseThe First Vertically Streamer-Recommended Game? You, Enlarged by OBS, Are the Protagonist!In the fictional social media platform "Vitter," you aim to go viral as a VTuber in this game.Not just stream-friendly, but stream-recommended.

name: Sakura Isekai Adventure 2
description: The second part of the Sakura Isekai Adventure series. A yuri fantasy story about Aki, a young woman on a journey to rescue a kidnapped priestess alongside her companions, who might be more than just fellow party members.

name: Logix: The Missing Part
description: A First Person Puzzle Game in which you fix the Logic behind the Puzzle, and then solve the Puzzle to verify what you fixed.

name: Geras
description: "Geras" is a psychological horror game that explores themes of aging, mortality, and the fear of the unknown, with its haunting atmosphere and storytelling, But beware - in the world of "Geras" not everything is as it seems, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs with each passing moment.

name: Flavors of Fortune
description: Flavors of Fortune is a casual pixel art arcade game about cooking and time management. Quickly cook and serve customers' orders to fulfill the day's profit quota and progress through a heartwarming story about taking over an owner's legacy.

name: Flame Protector: Sliding Kill
description: Keeping the flame burning is your only purpose. Flame Protector is a casual survival game where you protect the flames from an ever-increasing number of enemies until they reach the end of the flames.

name: Iridescent
description: Take to the skies in this vibrant eldritch roguelike as you blast away foes as a moth! Fell colossal creatures, collect items, and trade with cats in this colorful explosion of a game.

name: Room 14
description: You are inside an endless Highschool but there is a way you can escape. Search in the hallways of the school and find the changes within them to reach Room 14.

name: Marble Madness
description: Marble Madness is a tense and exciting pinball card building game. Using pinball collision as the main gameplay, supplemented by card construction, each game has a different experience, so experience the exhilaration of each collision.

name: Cosmic Trip
description:
"Long ago in the Cosmic Universe exists a world where one can only access by sleeping...

Rhyme - The Goddess Of Dreams is the creator of said world who resides in her floating castle, One night a Nightmarish being known as "Wizzmare" invades her world and imprisons her in his locket.

With the goddess of dreams incapacitated - Wizzmare spreads his power throughout the land by unleashing nightmarish monsters who spread havoc.

All seemed hopeless...

However there is a young girl named "Mel" who sleeping during this time, arrives to the dream realm and discovers monsters all over the place.

It's up to this plucky child to save the dream goddess and restore this realm back to the paradise it was!!

name: Puzzlehub: Businesswoman Hentai
description: Hentai girls from various professions will accompany you. You can play with just one click.

name: One-inch Tactics
description: Turn the tide of the war with nuanced strategies in One-inch Tactics.

name: Prison Loop
description: Embark on a journey of anomalies and repetition in "Prison Loop," a captivating indie puzzle game. Trapped in a mysterious temporal loop within a high-security prison, your objective is to observe anomalies throughout the environment.

name: Perimeter: Legate Edition
description: Perimeter is a real-time strategy game with a destructible world. Utilize the environment for resource gathering and defense against enemies. Immerse yourself in the millennia-spanning history of the Chains of Worlds and lead a faction in the struggle for survival.

name: Bagel Love Story
description: A light-hearted and enjoyable short romance VN! The protagonist, Fan Tong, struggles to lose weight in hopes of finding a job, but the journey is far from smooth. Until one day, a cute and sunny girl named Bagel comes into his life, kickstarting a story of weight loss, cross-dressing, and romance!

name: Adult Puzzle: Hentai Maid Aruha
description: Maid Aruha is here for you..She will take care of you.

name: Trojan
description: "Trojan" is the first innovative fantasy war chess game to utilize a synchronous turn-based strategy. The victory depends on whose strategy surpasses the other, determined by who can look further into the unpredictable future.

name: Prism Indigo DX
description: Fight your friends to save your friends in Prism Indigo, a vicious retro-styled bullet hell shooter starring a rookie magical girl.

name: Secret Pie: End Roll
description: Secret Pie DLC END ROLL!

name: Nectarmare
description: Nectarmare is a single player game where you control a bee collecting nectar for the winter. But watch out there are many things that will hurt or even eat a small bee out in the wild. The environment is full of dangers so take care while chasing for nectar.

name: Interweaver
description: Embark on a hauntingly beautiful journey in Interweaver, a whimsical puzzle platformer. Play as the Weaver, a necromancy student on a quest to rescue familiars from the clutches of Sepultus Academia. Unravel mysteries and use magic to weave your way through captivating landscapes.

name: Path Weaver
description: Path Weaver is an interactive puzzle game where you can solve puzzles by controlling your characters and placing the right scenes in the right timelines, as if you were filling a storybook. Different puzzles are waiting for you in many places, from pyramids to Aztec temples.

name: Cafe Owner Simulator: Farm DLC
description: Have you opened your restaurant yet? Now you have the opportunity to supplement your menu with organic products, increase the profit of your restaurant and simply enjoy the nature and atmosphere of the farm. Grow, water, feed, get resources. Animals, beds and greenhouses are waiting for you!

name: Robo Pose
description: Robo Pose is a difficult game about Robot that needs to strike the right Pose in order to overcome procedurally generated obstacles.

name: Escape From Zombietown
description: Escape From Zombietown is an Action Shooter FPS where you collect guns, grenades and consumables to help you fight off the zombies while you make your way out of town. With 20 levels filled to the brim with zombies, this game has all the zombie annihilating action you need.

name: Yu Sha Rong Shen Jin
description: What kind of product is it? It is a simple tower defense game with text plot, visual interaction of novels, and the nature of love cultivation.

name: Pizzakai
description: Play as a deceased man by the name of Peppy who has been recently reincarnated as a freshly baked Pizza mobster. Offered a deal by a "Pizza God," Peppy must enter the crime den of the House of Unified Triple-Cheeses and engage in combat if he wants any chance of returning to his own world.

name: Shouldermen
description: Shouldermen is a dialog driven game where you partner with an angel and a devil. Your job: Rescue them from a virtual reality prison by getting them to say the password. The fate of the world hangs in the balance until they are free to stand on shoulders and guide people towards right and wrong.

name: Wake Cup
description: Fight against the flock of tired workers on a boring Monday morning with a cup of coffee and grow the economy. Build, sell, lose, improve, repeat! A clicker tower defence game with rogue-lite meta progression.

name: Astronave
description: Astronave is a minimalist tube shooter.

name: Speglar
description: Frantic 4-player laser ricocheting top-down shooter. Keep it casual and enjoy the chaos, or master the surprisingly deep mechanics to obliterate your enemies. Duke it out locally in free-for-all or 2v2.

name: Escape Island
description: "Escape Island: An exciting survival adventure! Your mission: Escape from a deserted island full of dangers. Explore, hunt and collect resources to survive. But beware of lurking threats! Use your intelligence and skills to overcome obstacles and escape!"

name: Cuckold House
description: In this story, you will find yourself in the center of the life of Jacob, who is unable to sufficiently satisfy his wife, who is trying in every way to help her husband become more confident in himself and in bed.

name: Aquium
description: Aquium is a casual single-player aquarium diorama designer where you can create your own underwater aquarium & relax with your fish. Embark on your customized ship to navigate the ocean, collect both real and fantastical fish, and add them to your uniquely designed aquarium!

name: Echoes Of Despair
description: "Echoes Of Despair" plunges players into the horror of an abandoned hospital, where Sarah, an investigative journalist, must survive supernatural forces while uncovering the dark secrets of the past.

name: Desposis
description: Father Mandus, armed only with his sacred crucifix and the hallowed verses of his Bible, embarks on a daring crusade to vanquish the malevolent presence that lurks within the cursed confines of the Williams mansion.

name: Excelios
description: Get ready for an exciting 2D platformer adventure, just like games such as Inside and Limbo. In Excelios, you become Lexi, a special character living inside a computer. Join Lexi on this thrilling adventure filled with puzzles, challenges. Can you defeat the bad guy and fix the computer's problems?

name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm Classic
description: The World-changing Cataclysm arrives in World of Warcraft Classic, with changes made from the original release based on fan feedback.

name: Little-Known Galaxy
description: Join Space Alliance as a new captain-in-training and work with your crew to solve the mysteries of an ancient relic found on the Grey Planet. Little-Known Galaxy is a cozy single-player RPG space adventure full of friendly characters, exploration, crafting, and farming.

name: Coffee Caravan
description: Fuel your coffee passion in Coffee Caravan! As a cafe manager, brew, experiment with delicious recipes, and build your dream coffee business on wheels. Serve customers, unlock new flavors, purchase appliances, and enjoy your procedurally generated road trip in this roguelite experience.

name: Imaginary Friend Asylum
description: Imaginary Friend Asylum is a psychological horror game where you play a patient at Hathmoore Children's Asylum. Along the way, you'll befriend 7 other children and their imaginary friends. Together, you will uncover a dark conspiracy where you are to receive a fate worse than death.

name: Iron & Lead
description: Hop in the gunner's seat of the Abner Jack in this first-person, arcade alley shooter set in a dieselpunk world. Fight through five chapters of relentless foes to defeat the invaders, and defend your planet. Swap between different guns, and use deployables as you battle against both ground and air.

name: Margoq's Lair
description: Margoq's Lair is a dark 2D top-down roguelike hack'n'slash dungeon crawler. Engage in action-packed combat, select between randomly generated spells, combine your abilities to make devastating attacks and find mythical items on your journey to escape the evil wizard's lair without dying even once!

name: Conqueror of Time
description: Conqueror Of Time is a traditional dungeon crawl rogue game with a time travel theme. Choose a character from different time periods and fight your way through dungeons using various items from different times and spaces. Use time travel abilities to fight alongside your past or future self.

name: Hentai Beauties
description: Immerse yourself in a world of mesmerizing beauty and relaxing puzzles, accompanied by a soul-soothing soundtrack. Plus, feel free to grab and fiddle around with some boobs for an extra dose of fun!

name: Ramas' Call: Twisted Timing
description: Point and Click adventure in a medieval fantasy ambience. Imagine you are a random tabletop geek looking for new adventures and your friend makes a tiiny mistake with his time machine... Now add an adventurer, a noble and a detective and mix them all together in yourself. Must be fun, right?

name: The Tower on the Borderland
description: A survival-horror game inspired by Super Metroid and The House on the Borderland.

name: Yolk Heroes: A Long Tamago
description: Yolk Heroes is the virtual pet game you've always wanted! RPG Mechanics, minigames, quests...who doesn't love quests? Your elf will explore, grow stronger, and embark on an adventure to deliver the world from evil! OR! You can just relax and enjoy your little friend.

name: Kill the Climbers
description: Kill The Climbers is a retro roguelite arcade game where you play as a mountain and yeti with the goal of defending the peak. Use your quick wits, skillshot-slinging abilities, and animal defenders to Kill The Climbers!

name: A Tower Full of Cats
description: A Tower Full of Cats is a hidden object game where you need to pet cats through the whole history of mankind... and beyond!

name: Moving Shadows
description: A fast-paced horror game in a black and white paper world. Sneak, run, hide in a labyrinth of corridors, trying to collect all the flowers before the top hatted, scarred face skeleton of a nightmare catches you. Solve puzzles, find items & trick the monsters in the dangerous world of Moving Shadows.

name: The Court of Wanderers
description: The Court of Wanderers is a puzzle game focussed on logical and spatial reasoning. Enter an open world where you never know what you will find behind the next door. Wander, think, solve, and be amazed as the impossible becomes possible.

name: Way of Rhea
description: A puzzle adventure. Hard puzzles, forgiving mechanics. Solve mind bending color puzzles that build off of one another, unlock new areas of a vibrant hub world, chat with townsfolk, and undo any mistake with the press of a button.

name: Songs of Conquest
description: Songs of Conquest is a turn based game where you build a kingdom, raise armies and control powerful magicians called wielders. You’ll quest around for loot, fight monsters, optimize build orders and strategies to pick off the enemy teams. We call it Classic Adventure Strategy, for short.

name: Trauma
description: "Trauma" is a walking simulator action-adventure game sprinkled with horror elements. The only action you can perform besides walking is stabbing with a knife. Enjoy your journey into the strange world of dreams.

name: 3Chess
description: Sin descripción

name: Defend It!: Machinegun
description: In this DLC, you will receive a new ally that will help you defend your base. And bonus, you will be able to shoot automatically.

name: Slime Climb: A Count Pumpcula Tale
description: Bounce, Jump and Slide your way out of The Abyss. It's time to Slime Climb!

name: Mercenary Tactics
description: Command a squad of mercenaries to battle monstrous foes across five stages. Start small, strategically deploy and upgrade your team using earned resources. Build an unstoppable force and prove your tactical skills by surviving the onslaught and securing victory.

name: Parkour Master
description: Master precise jumps and timing as you parkour your way through 10 levels filled with challenging obstacles and unique platform types.

name: Sikhl
description: Sikhl is set somewhere in the southwestern USA. There's been various reports of EDF troops getting fired upon by unknown assailants near a vast canyon area. Duke's been ordered to travel there and find out what's going on.

name: Skinless The Horror Story Quest
description: In "Skinless The Horror Story Quest," journey through a nightmarish blend of reality and hallucination. Wake up in a haunting hospital, face your fears in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies, and confront the doctor behind the epidemic. Can you escape the darkness within and without?

name: Junkfood 3: Wow Wow West
description: Junkfood 3 is an MBF21-compatible Speedmapping Community Project held in Meowgi's Pacifist Paradise Discord Server which features 94 newly designed slaughter levels; This time, with a wild western theme! The basic premise was to make "Junk Food" slaughter (BFG spammy, high monster count maps) where not a lot of time is spent deliberating about layout/detailing/fight design and other things that can bog a mapper down. It's just good BFG fun.

name: Solar Dominion
description: Its Sentries versus Serpents in this multiplayer shooting adventure. Team up or compete against one another to earn rewards.

name: The Sea God
description: A tiny narrative game on gods, leviathans, death, blessings.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzle - Unknown Worlds
