description: Summon elemental kitties in this roguelike card game! You are the only free feline in a world dominated by humans, navigate through mysterious dungeons, build card combos, and free your kind The future of your species rests in your paws!

name: Archaeogem
description: Hats up and whips out; the jungle's mysteries await! Explore lush biomes, use your trusty whip to extract wild flowers' mystic powers, and collect rare gems in this dynamic precision-platformer. Unearth archaeological marvels and become a legend - if you make it out alive!

name: Gilded Eternal
description: Gilded Eternal is a replayable, run-based, action, arcade game about luring monsters and hoarding gold.

name: Genopanic
description: Genopanic is a pixel-art, Metroidvania-inspired adventure-platformer. Explore corridors of the space station, teeming with secrets and dangers, and engage in boss fights. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden mysteries in the dark atmosphere of a sci-fi research complex. Discover the truth with each step.

name: Master Key
description: Master key is a top down adventure game with a strong focus on item based exploration and secrets. Embark on a journey to discover what that key could be used for and meet colorful characters !

name: Seablip
description: Build your own house on the heartwarming island called Seablip. Build and upgrade your own ship. Fight as a pirate. Dig for treasure. Fish. Or investigate why the polar ice is melting. A long journey with mystery and adventure awaits!

name: Go Outside Simulator
description: For when you can't or won't go outside, go outside from the comfort of inside. Explore different environments, look for hidden Easter eggs, chill and relax in virtual worlds. Go Outside Simulator is a for fun game used to help in the future development of therapeutic VR programs.

name: Benny the Blob
description: This is a tricky puzzle game with cute little blobs, sparkly gems, 50 levels, and the ability to load and create custom levels. Benny The Blob features some difficult and headache-inducing levels that will challenge even the most experienced puzzle fans.

name: Wildermyth: Omenroad
description: Wildermyth's second DLC introduces a new game mode that includes roguelike ​​tactical challenges with progression across runs, as well as a rich new story campaign that takes your heroes into the mysterious Netherflare.

name: 8th Millennium: War Against the Pagan Gods
description: Nikolai must fight to bury his darkness when he confronts the ruthless power of a dragon seeking to entrap him with visions of his past. Explore the dragon’s kingdom, clear elusive dungeons, and power up to smash your old idols and take down this fierce foe.

name: Sclash: Joystick
description: Let's celebrate French video games together! Unlock a Games Made In France mask and weapon for use in the game.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - Mountain Range Pack
description: Channel your inner cowboy with gear and cosmetics inspired by life on the range. This pack includes apparel, fishing gear, vehicle and boat skins, and an emote.

name: American Truck Simulator: Sports Paint Jobs Pack
description: Calling all Sports Fans! We are introducing the Sports Paint Job Pack for American Truck Simulator. Decorate your truck with these beautiful American sports-themed paint jobs. From the court to the rink, they will have your truck looking like a heavyweight champion in no time!

name: H.I.v.C.A.: Human Intelligence vs Computer Algorithm
description: "H.I.v.C.A." is a strategic game where every choice matters. Gather resources, develop technologies, and strategically place your forces to ensure victory over opponents. There is no room for a draw in this game - only one can become the absolute ruler of the new world.

name: Way of the Hunter: Outfits Pack
description: The Outfits Pack contains one original costume for each character - River, April, Wallace, Jackie and Malachi, usable in Free Hunt and Multiplayer mode.

name: Tower! Simulator 3: KPIT Airport
description: Control over Pittsburgh International Airport (IATA: PIT, ICAO: KPIT, FAA LID: PIT), with destinations throughout North America and Europe developed by FeelThere team for Tower! Simulator 3.

name: Vigor: Reinforcements Pack
description: Unlock Early Access! The Vigor - Reinforcements Pack, contains an exclusive uniform and a unique title that you can wear as a badge of honor by being one of the very first to play Vigor on this new chapter.

name: Medved Hellraiser 3: Green Elephant
description: 3D first-person shooter where you have to fight monsters, gopniks, debt collectors and homeless people!

name: SMYS: Retro Blocks
description: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Retro block style.

name: SMYS: Retro Blocks
description: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Retro block style.

name: SMYS: Crystal Blocks
description: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Crystal block style.

name: SMYS: Crystal Blocks
description: Get your stairs to look stairstastic!This DLC unlocks the Crystal block style.

name: SMYS: Gem Blocks
description: Get your stairs to look stairstastic! This DLC unlocks the Gem block style.

name: SMYS: Gem Blocks
description:
Get your stairs to look stairstastic!

This DLC unlocks the Gem block style in the game settings.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Old but Gold Pack
description: It's never too late to come face to face with real legends. Dive into the past with the Old but Gold Pack and the 1994 Bugatti EB110 SS, the legendary Lancia Delta HF Integrale, the Lancia Stratos Group 5 and the Nissan Skyline GT-R R32.

name: Dik Journey
description: An NSFW match-3 game for fabulous gay or bisexual gaymers, offering light-hearted entertainment and relaxation. Players progress through match-3 rounds, developing their power and skills to conquer handsome and hot guys within the game, engaging in NSFW interactions with them.

name: The Hope
description: Join a desperate father in his quest to find his daughter, in this first-person horror survival game. Unravel the mysteries of his old town and confront unimaginable horrors to reunite with his lost daughter.

name: Nobodies: Silent Blood
description: Step back into the shoes of Asset 1080, the intelligence agency's top cleaner. Puzzle your way through 14 unique locations, devising clever ways to hide all evidence of your employer's deadly actions. Get in, get out, and leave no bodies behind.

name: Stupid Space Shooter
description: This game is a Stupid Space Shooter. Control your ship to blow up the bad guys, they are red. Levelup to gain upgrades to fight more bad guys

name: Pixel Fish
description: An eater with action roguelite elements. Swim around a hostile sea while you avoid dangers and eat fish to gain experience and grow. Play as one of twelve unlockable characters, each with different traits. Earn evolution points to upgrade your stats, allowing you to eat ever-larger fish.

name: The Very Idle Game
description: The most satisfying idle clicker game in the world

name: Mr Snuggles Dungeon Adventure
description: A teddy bear alone in a dungeon, his only hope for escape is... kitchen implements? A zany roguelike adventure with 100+ unique items, 9 bosses, 15+ weapons with upgrades, potion and scroll crafting and random dungeons. Explore, fight collect loot and use pineapples to help Mr Snuggles escape.

name: Poker Dungeon: Joker's Madness
description: A combination game between turn-based deck-building and poker rogue-like. Strengthen your stats by combining character cards with poker hands.

name: Emergency in Space
description: You are the sole survivor aboard an abandoned space ship, lost in the vastness of space. Silence reigns around you, with the sounds of cosmic waves and the echoes of the ship's systems. Your mission is to survive.

name: PlasticFighter
description: In the game "Plastic Fighter" you are waiting for an exciting mission in a factory, which has been mined and threatens to explode in just 30 minutes. Your task is to explore the factory, find and disarm all the explosive devices placed, and fight with the armed guards.

name: Feel the Fear Around
description: First person videogame. Help save the world from the zombie invasion through 5 levels. Always reload ammo and shoot them in the head to defeat them first. WORKING AT MORE DIFFICULT LEVELS.

name: Shoot to Pleasure
description: Let's shoot wildly together!

name: Cute Socks
description: Cute Socks is an interactive story about an eighteen-year-old girl who is home alone. She quickly sheds her clothes and begins playing around the house in just her socks. When her friend Julia arrives, their friendship turns into a budding lesbian relationship full of happiness and multiple orgasms!

name: Fantasy Beauties - All Girls Photo Pack
description: This content pack enables you to instantly access all photo packs in Fantasy Beauties. 36 levels await you, giving you a chance to feast your eyes on 36 depictions of stunning, myth-inspired goddesses.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Astrid Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Astrid, the warrior, who traverses realms of valor with unyielding spirit and noble strength. Her fierce gaze and gleaming axe embody the courage and beauty of a true warrior.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Brunhilda Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Brunhilda, the berserker, who roars into battle with primal ferocity. Clad in battle-worn armor, her tempestuous presence and fiery eyes showcase the unyielding spirit of a true warrior. Each swing embodies the might and awe-inspiring force of a berserker.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Calliope Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Calliope, the Greek queen, whose regal presence and divine authority command attention. Draped in Olympian robes, her gaze and gleaming crown reflect the wisdom and poise of her sovereign rule.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Elowen Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Elowen, the elvish dancer, who moves with ethereal grace. Adorned in garments reflecting nature's hues, she twirls elegantly, enchanting onlookers. Her joyful, woodland-inspired eyes and movements celebrate elvish artistry and the harmonious spirit of dance.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Fiona Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Fiona, the human princess, who graces her realm with a gentle, regal aura. Adorned in attire befitting her royal stature, her presence blends grace and kindness, with a benevolent gaze that oversees her kingdom. Her compassionate heart makes her the embodiment of warmth and benevolence in royalty.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Freya Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images featuring Freya, who combines ferocity and grace on the battlefield. Wielding her weapon with unyielding determination, her gaze embodies the untamed spirit of the North, marking her as the epitome of Viking prowess and the beauty of a warrior maiden.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Ivy Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with IVY, the witch, who emerges from the shadows in mysterious robes whispering ancient incantations. Her eyes, aglow with arcane wisdom, and her enigmatic presence converge as she traces sigils and weaves spells with ethereal grace.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Luna Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images featuring Luna, the necromancer cloaked in night-sky robes, reigning in shadowed realms with eerie mystique. Mastering forbidden arts, her gaze raises and commands the dead, epitomizing necromantic power and spectral beauty.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Michiko Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Michiko, the martial artist, whose discipline and precision in every move testify to years of training. Dressed in a martial arts gi that highlights her prowess, she moves with focused intensity. Her commanding presence and serene eyes reflect mastery of strength and combat technique.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Poppy Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Poppy, the wood fairy, radiating whimsical energy in the enchanted woods. Adorned in colors of blooming flowers, she joyously flits about, guarding nature and echoing woodland melodies. Her dewdrop-sparkling eyes capture the charm and playful spirit of the fairy realm.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Selene Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Selene, the vampire lord, who emerges from the shadows draped in regal attire. Commanding the night with immortal authority, her crimson eyes blaze with eternal wisdom. Her haunting gaze and elegant yet menacing presence embody the vampiric allure and eternal beauty of the shadowy realm.

name: Fantasy Beauties - Sigrún Photo Pack
description: Unlock levels and images with Sigrún, the Valkyrie, descending from the heavens in shimmering celestial armor. With wings spread wide, she commands the skies, inspiring heroism on the battlefield. Her piercing gaze and each beat of her wings embody Valkyric majesty, making her a beacon of honor and celestial beauty.

name: Custom Order Maid 3D2: It's a Night Magic the Change of Seasons All in One Pack
description: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 It's a Night Magic the Change of Seasons ALL in ONE Pack is for those who need a little more stimulation during the calm seasons. 4 Yotogi Skills 6 Events 4 Costume Sets 2 Backgrounds 1 Karaoke Dance

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Park Managers' Collection Pack
description: Discover a range of iconic species with the Jurassic World Evolution 2: Park Managers' Collection Pack. From legendary giants of the oceans and skies, to the most diminutive of prehistoric creatures to walk the earth!

name: Beauty Jigsaw
description: "Beauty Jigsaw" is a beautiful girl puzzle game with exquisite picture. We recommend that you open this game at your leisure time, while brewing a cup of fragrant coffee, and then enjoy a relaxing puzzle time ^_^

name: Monster Musume Fantastic Life
description: Monster Musume Fantastic Life is a simulation gacha game based on "Monster Musume" by Okayado.

name: The Lost Compressor
description: A violence-free top-down puzzle adventure for everyone interested in engineering.

name: Is this Game Trying to Kill Me? Preface
description: This is a small free prequel to the Is this Game Trying to Kill Me?. An old cabin deep in the dense forest, a strange computer, and a game that's trying to kill you!

name: Geometry Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Grimguard Tactics
description:
Grimguard Tactics is an epic, dark fantasy RPG strategy game with an expansive Hero summon and simple easy to learn turn-based tactics gameplay.

The Primorva, an ancient evil has awoken from the shadows. To free the world of Terenos you must summon and bring together its most powerful, legendary, and dangerous heroes in attempt to drive back the oncoming darkness. In battle you'll forge unlikely alliances and assemble an epic team of the greatest heroes this world has ever seen!

name: Fohh
description: Sin descripción

name: Escape Peng
description: Can you reach the top of the crevasse?

name: Dino Precision Platformer
description: Dino Precision Platformer is an intuitive platformer game in which you play as a cute little dinosaur. The main feature of the game is that the platforms on which the dinosaur must jump appear and disappear at certain points in time.

name: Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13
description: Cursed Places: Hotel Floor 13 is an observation game where you are trapped on the Cursed Floor 13. Reach the first floor to escape from this cursed endless loop

name: Celestial Contact
description: Experience Celestial Contact, a captivating fusion of shooter and rogue-lite genres set in a mysterious arena adorned with beautiful 2D pixel art. Battle through waves of enemies, gather gear, conquer bosses, and enhance your character to strive for the highest score and lasting survival!
